description: Died from unknown causes
Fell from the top of a lighthouse, manipulated by Walter Keene
Sliced by a swinging blade via manipulation by Oberon Geller
Bitten by a venomous cricket set up by Tissa Gamini via manipulation by Oberon Geller
Blunt trauma from a boomerang by Alistair Koch, planned with James Turner, on orders from Edmund Cloudsley
Died from unknown causes
Stabbed with a rapier by Gabriel Hubert via manipulation by Oberon Geller
Shot with a pistol by Oberon Geller
Shot by Walter Keene
Blasted with a cannon by Peter Battley
Hit with a chakram throwing blade by Sri Thagson via manipulation by Oberon Geller
Rapidly aged via the Golden Idol by Edmund Cloudsley
Caught in an explosion set up by Edmund Cloudsley
Fell to his death
Caught in an explosion set up by Edmund Cloudsley
Incinerated by the Golden Idol used by Willard Wright
Stabbed with a longsword by Alistair Koch
Drank from a poisoned wine glass during the ritual of dispute, orchestrated by Walter Keene and David Gorran
Executed by the Brotherhood of Masks after his miracle was proven untrue by Angus MacBain
Pierced with an axe by Oberon Geller
Died from unknown causes
Pushed off a cliff by Albert Cloudsley
Impaled with a harpoon thrown by Carlos Luna via manipulation by Oberon Geller
Executed by the Brotherhood of Masks after his miracle was proven untrue by Angus MacBain
Poisoned by Ada Baker on orders from Walter Keene
Fatal head wound after falling from his horse
Hit with a mace by Pandula Senevi via manipulation by Oberon Geller
Executed by the Brotherhood of Masks after his miracle was proven untrue by Angus MacBain
Stabbed by David Gorran on orders from Edmund Cloudsley
